insert into t_order (member_id,orderDate,orderType,orderStatus,setmeal_id) values (#{memberId},#{orderDate},#{orderType},#{orderStatus},#{setmealId})
mapper.select: select a.orderDate as orderDate, a.orderType as orderType, b.name as member, c.name as setmeal from t_order a inner join t_member b on a.member_id = b.id inner join t_setmeal c on a.setmeal_id = c.id where a.id = #{id}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate = #{value}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate >= #{value}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate = #{value} and orderStatus = '已到诊'
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate >= #{value} and orderStatus = '已到诊'

select s.name, count(o.id) setmeal_count ,count(o.id)/(select count(id) from t_order) proportion from t_order o inner join t_setmeal s on s.id = o.setmeal_id group by o.setmeal_id order by setmeal_count desc limit 0,4
